subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Doug Mirabelli went 3 for 3 with a home run, and he recovered from a base-running gaffe to drive in the tie-breaking run in the seventh and lead the Red Sox past the Baltimore Orioles, 7-4, yesterday in Boston.
snippet: Doug Mirabelli went 3 for 3 with a home run, and he recovered from a base-running gaffe to drive in the tie-breaking run in the seventh and lead the Red Sox past the Baltimore Orioles, 7-4, yesterday in Boston.
